meanings.definition: The state or quality of being premature.
meanings.sent1: Her prematureness surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The prematureness of the flowers blooming in winter was unusual.
meanings.sent3: The prematureness of the cake baking made it a funny disaster.
meanings.sent4: The prematureness of the sunrise painted the sky in pink hues.
meanings.sent5: The prematureness of the alarm clock made her jump out of bed.

meanings.definition: The condition of occurring or developing before the usual or proper time.
meanings.sent1: The prematureness of his arrival caught us off guard.
meanings.sent2: We were not prepared for the prematureness of the snowfall.
meanings.sent3: The prematureness of the joke made us all laugh unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The prematureness of the news spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The prematureness of the train departure left many passengers stranded.
